Package com.semedy.reasoner.edb.persistentstore.bplustree

Class BPlusTree<KeyType,KeyBufferType>

java.lang.Object
com.semedy.reasoner.edb.persistentstore.bplustree.BPlusTree<KeyType,KeyBufferType>
Type Parameters:
KeyType -
KeyBufferType -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class BPlusTree<KeyType,KeyBufferType> extends Object implements Closeable
This class implements a B+ Tree on disk.
The disk IO is handled by the BPlusTreeFile class.
Author:
angele

    • setWriteThrough

      public void setWriteThrough(boolean writethrough)
      if writeThrough is true, all insert or remove operations are directly written to file
      Thus after an insert or remove operation tree is
      is always consistent on the disc
      Otherwise nodes are cached and written to the file
      by calling flushDirtyNodes or close
      Parameters:
      writethrough -

    • startBulkLoading

      public void startBulkLoading() throws IOException, EDBException
      Start bulk loading. Loading is sped up tremendiously
      Works only if bplus tree is empty, otherwise normal (cached)
      inserts are performed

      IOException
